marklogic.body: I just started the Mind Movie Matrix for for money, as well as the Mind Movie for Business Success a couple of days ago. Since, I have started getting terrible Headaches that are on and Off throughout the day. It's like a sharp pain that comes and goes, just on the right side of my forehead. i'm also getting a "rushing" sound periodically in my left ear. Could this have anything to do w/the mind movies? I have never had this happen before. Thanks!
